mapper.select: select task.assignee_,actinst.activity_name_,to_char(task.create_,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss'),to_char(task.end_,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') from jbpm4_hist_task task,jbpm4_hist_actinst actinst where task.execution_ like #{id} and task.dbid_ = actinst.htask_ and task.state_ = 'completed' order by task.create_
